articles.author: Yaseen Rana
articles.title: Moeen Ali’s reopened wound exposes deeper spin faultlines in English game - Wisden
articles.description: England's reliance on Moeen Ali shows that English cricket is no closer to answering longstanding questions around the development of spinners, writes Yas Rana.
articles.content:
England’s reliance on Moeen Ali shows that English cricket is no closer to answering longstanding questions around the development of spinners, writes Yas Rana.
